TerrainDef.label: Rich Soil
TerrainDef.Description: Soil that has been enriched with mulch to improve crop growth. Fertility: 150%.

TerrainDef.label: Tilled Soil
TerrainDef.Description: Tilled soil is enriched with mulch and synthetic ammonia for maximum fertility. It will allow you to plant crops properly. Fertility: 200%.

TerrainDef.Name: TileStoneBase
TerrainDef.Description: Solid stone tiles for a castle feeling. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.Label: Dark Wood Tiles
TerrainDef.Description: Dark wood panels with a dark border around each tile. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Oak Planks
TerrainDef.Description: Unfinished oak. Long horizontal planks with a light coloring. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Brown Wood Floor
TerrainDef.Description: Thin vertical brown planks. For that warm homey feeling. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Light Wood Planks
TerrainDef.Description: Staggered joint, light colored wood flooring in short, horizontal planks. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Styled Wood Floor
TerrainDef.Description: Three small planks per tile that alternate from horizontal to vertical every other tile. Reddish brown in color. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Brown Wood Planks
TerrainDef.Description: Vertical medium sized planks with staggered joints. Brown in color. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Tan Wood Planks
TerrainDef.Description: Medium sized planks in a horizontal pattern with a tanned wood look. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Parquet
TerrainDef.Description: Herringbone flooring. Regal elegance for the sophisticated colonist. Takes some time to build. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Concrete
TerrainDef.Description: Quick-poured concrete in a flat, grey surface. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.label: Dark Concrete
TerrainDef.Description: Dark concrete in a honeycomb pattern. You'll need to be able to dig out the ground to pour this. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.label: Ceramic Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Small white ceramic tiles with a dark bordering. Quick to move around on. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Paved Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Large grey tiles with a thick, dark border. Quick to move around on. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Silver Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Expensive and slow to build. Soft grey tiles with a grey bordering. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Sterile Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Sterile tiles are clean, light grey squares. Very useful in hospitals to help prevent infections. Quite slow to build. Beauty: 0.

TerrainDef.label: White Metal Tile
TerrainDef.Description: White metal square tiles, for that spaceship look. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Black Metal Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Black metal square tiles, for that spaceship look. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Grey Metal Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Square grey metal tiles with thin borders. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.label: Patterned Metal Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Grey metal tiles with fancy patterns. Beauty: 3.

TerrainDef.Name: MetalPlateBase
TerrainDef.Description: Metal plates complete with rivets for an industrial look. Time-consuming to make, but easy to keep clean. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.label: Beige Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Stunning beige carpet that is soft and relaxing. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Red Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Plush carpet in a lovely rose hue. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Green Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Naturalistic-feeling green carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Blue Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Toe-hugging plush carpet in a cool blue color. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Cream Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Inviting cream-colored carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Dark Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Professional-looking dark gray carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Description: Soft carpet with a vivid marigold tint. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Yellow Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: A summer yellow-coloured carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Turquoise Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: A soothing blue-green carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Purple Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Carpet in a majestic purple shade. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: White Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Undyed white carpet. Comfortable underfoot but stains easily. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Black Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: A carpet in brooding black. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Red Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Checker board pattern carpet in a lovely rose hue. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Description: Carpeting with a checker board pattern in a vivid marigold tint. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Description: Summer yellow-colored checker board pattern carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Green Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Naturalistic-feeling green checker board pattern carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Turquoise Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: A soothing blue-green checker board pattern carpet. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Blue Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Toe-hugging plush checker board pattern carpet in a cool blue color. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: Purple Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Checker board pattern carpet in a majestic purple shade. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Label: White Checkered Carpet
TerrainDef.Description: Undyed white checker board pattern carpet. Comfortable underfoot but stains easily. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.Description: A checker board pattern carpet in brooding black. Beauty: 4.

TerrainDef.label: Gold Tile
TerrainDef.Description: Gold tiles, because you're worth it. Beauty: 5.

TerrainDef.label: Solid Gold
TerrainDef.Description: Solid gold, because you're wasteful. Beauty: 10.

TerrainDef.Name: MediumBrickBase
TerrainDef.Description: Bricks laid in an interlocking pattern. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.Name: SmallBrickBase
TerrainDef.Description: Smaller bricks laid in an interlocking pattern. Takes slightly longer to make than the regular variety. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.Name: MedBrickBase
TerrainDef.Description: Bricks laid in a circular interlocking pattern. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.Name: CobblestoneBase
TerrainDef.Description: Simple cobblestone flooring constructed only using small rocks found nearby. Beauty: 1.

TerrainDef.Name: BrickUnevenBase
TerrainDef.Description: Bricks of various sizes laid on the floor. Perfect for that rustic look. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.Name: StoneTileBase
TerrainDef.Description: Smoothed and polished stone tiles. Time-consuming to make, but easy to keep clean. Beauty: 2.

TerrainDef.Name: BrickHerringboneBase
TerrainDef.Description: Bricks laid in an interlocking pattern. Beauty: 2.
